data.title: Indiana Bill Would Mandate Bitcoin in Pensions and Shield Self-Custody Rights
data.description: A newly introduced bill in Indiana would require public retirement programs to offer Bitcoin-related investment options and would also limit how much power local governments have to restrict the use of digital assets.The proposal was filed on Thursday by State Representative Kyle Pierce, a Republican from Anderson. Known as House ...
data.keywords: digital assets, House Financial Institutions Committee, local governments, Indiana, public pension funds, State Representative Kyle Pierce, Bitcoin ETF, Indiana House
